All Classes

Class Summary
Class Description
Ball
Ball class for managing in game ball
Brick
Brick class maintains brick shape, size, color and current status (broken,type ect.)
CementBrick
Cement brick is a child of brick class
ClayBrick
clay brick is a child of brick class
Crack
Crack class which manages drawing the cracks on the brick and the direction of the crack based on ball impact
DebugConsole
DebugConsol class responsible for processing user interaction with debug menu
DebugPanel
DebugPanel class which creates the debug interface and contains its dimensions and contents
DiamondBrick
DiamondBrick class child of brick class
GameBoard
GameBoard class is responsible for drawing the game environment and managing user interaction with it
GameFrame
GameFrame class is responsible for the game menu graphics and uesr interaction
GraphicsMain
GraphicsMain class is the main code driver as it contains the main method
HomeMenu
HomeMenu Class responsible for managing the menu interface and the player interaction with buttons and game environment in a graphical sense
LevelGenerator
LevelGenerator class is responsible for the level layout and providing the brick layout for each level and moving from level to next
ObsidianBrick
ObsidianBrick class is a child of Brick class
Player
Player class which creates the player object and manages its characteristics
RubberBall
child class of ball which contains the information about the ball's color and size
SteelBrick
SteelBrick class is a child of Brick class
Wall
Wall class which manages gameplay parts concerning the ball/brick interactions and their behaviors
